metadata.title: CVE-2015-3223 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The ldb_wildcard_compare function in ldb_match.c in ldb before 1.1.24, asused in the AD LDAP server in Samba 4.x before 4.1.22, 4.2.x before 4.2.7,and 4.3.x before 4.3.3, mishandles certain zero values, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via crafted packets.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3223` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libnss-winbind - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libpam-winbind - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libparse-pidl-perl - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libsmbclient - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libwbclient0 - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
python-samba - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
registry-tools - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-common - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-common-bin - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-libs - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-testsuite - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
smbclient - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
winbind - 2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

ldb-tools - 2:1.1.24-1ubuntu1
libldb1 - 2:1.1.24-1ubuntu1
python-ldb - 2:1.1.24-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: samba package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.3.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
ldb package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.1.24-1ubuntu1').
